mapper.insert: insert into goodsSystem.shop(shop_Name, shop_ImgUrl, shop_Class, shop_Admin, shop_State, shop_Address, shop_Concern, create_Time, update_Time) VALUES(#{shopName},#{shopImgUrl},#{shopClass},#{shopAdmin},#{shopState},#{shopAddress},#{shopConcern},#{createTime},#{updateTime});
mapper.update: update goodsSystem.shop set shop_Concern=#{shopConcern} , shop_State=#{shopState} , shop_Name=#{shopName} , shop_ImgUrl=#{shopImgUrl} shop_Class=#{shopClass} , shop_Address=#{shop_Address} , update_Time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select id, shop_Name, shop_ImgUrl, shop_Class, shop_Admin, shop_State, shop_Address, shop_Concern, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.shop where id=#{id}
select id, shop_Name, shop_ImgUrl, shop_Class, shop_Admin, shop_State, shop_Address, shop_Concern, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.shop where shop_Admin=#{shopAdmin}
